headline: Mastercard Is One of the Largest Financial Companies by Market Cap. But Is It a Buy?
summary: Mastercard's simple but lucrative business model has powered it to a market cap approaching $500 billion.  With a market cap of nearly $500 billion, Mastercard (NYSE: MA) is a true corporate giant.  Like its chief rival Visa, Mastercard has a business model based on payment processing.
